name: Black Horse
overview: THE GAME: The constellations of the old gods have disappeared from the sky. That can only mean bad omens. As Knight of the Kingdom, you must avoid it. Your mission is to get the 45 stars spread over the different levels. To do this you will have to catch the king to reveal where they are. Controls: The game works with "Sinclair" or redefinable keys. Pressing the "B" key, you can return to the previous screen. Credits: Programmed by Alberto Otero Mato. Copyright 2009 Digital Brains
